abstract: Side Street column; Lois Evans, playwright and performance artist known as LuLu LoLo, has been canvassing New York City dressed as Joan of Arc and asking people to nominate women they think should be honored with public monument; Evans decries fact there are only five monuments to women in city.
lead_paragraph: Lois Evans, a playwright and performance artist known as LuLu LoLo, has taken the role of Joan of Arc to advance a push to honor Susan B. Anthony and Elizabeth Cady Stanton with a Central Park statue.

headline.main: A Street-Level Search for Women to Put on a Manhattan Pedestal
headline.print_headline: A Street-Level Search For Women to Put On a Pedestal

snippet: Lois Evans, a playwright and performance artist known as LuLu LoLo, has taken the role of Joan of Arc to advance a push to honor Susan B. Anthony and Elizabeth Cady Stanton with a Central Park statue.
